#include <cstdio>
//Fast Fibonacci evaluation
int main()
{
	int A,B;
	while(1)
	{
		long long int temp=0,f1=1,f2=2,count=0,A=0,B=0;
		scanf("%lld %lld",&A,&B);
		if(A==0&&B==0)
			break;
		else
		{
			while(1)
			{
			if(f1>=B) break;
			if(f1>=A)
			count+=1;
			temp=f1;
			f1=f2;
			f2+=temp;
			//printf("%lld ",f2);
			}
		}
		//printf("\n");
		printf("%lld\n",count);
	}
		return 0;
}
